SELECT IBD.ID AS inboundId, IT.ID AS itemId, IT.NAME AS itemName, MT.ID AS materialId, MT.NAME AS materialName, ST.ID AS storageId, ST.NAME AS storageName, IBD.QUANTITY, IBD.IN_DATE AS inDate, IBD.CATEGORY_CODE AS categoryCode, CAT.NAME AS categoryName, IBD.STATUS_CODE AS statusCode, STS.NAME AS statusName
FROM INBOUND IBD LEFT JOIN ITEM IT ON IBD.ITEM_ID = IT.ID LEFT JOIN MATERIAL MT ON IBD.MATERIAL_ID = MT.ID JOIN STORAGE ST ON IBD.STORAGE_ID = ST.ID LEFT JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE CAT ON IBD.CATEGORY_CODE = CAT.DETAIL_CODE AND CAT.MAIN_CODE = 'ITP' LEFT JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE STS ON IBD.STATUS_CODE = STS.DETAIL_CODE AND STS.MAIN_CODE = 'STS'
AND ( IT.NAME LIKE '%' || #{srhItemOrMaterialName} || '%' OR MT.NAME LIKE '%' || #{srhItemOrMaterialName} || '%' )
ORDER BY IBD.IN_DATE DESC
